attributes.expr: Query(     expression__Event__c(where: Name = "ExpressionConf", limit: 1)     [Id, Name, Tag_Line__c, Description__c] )  -> FIRST()  -> TRANSFORM(     {     "title": $source.expression__Tag_Line__c,     "description": SUBSTITUTE($source.expression__Description__c, "\n", BR())     }  )

Query(expression__Event__c(where: Name = "ExpressionConf")     [Id, Name, Start_Date__c, End_Date__c] )  -> FIRST()  -> TRANSFORM(         "📅 ${TEXT(DAY($source.expression__Start_Date__c))} - ${DATETIMEFORMAT(DATETODATETIME($source.expression__End_Date__c), "dd MMMM yyyy")} ◆ 🗺️Los Angeles, CA"     )

{ 	"stats": [ 		{ 			"label": "Speakers", 			"value": TEXT(SIZE(QUERY(Speaker__c))) 		},     {       "label": "Days",       "value":                  Query(expression__Event__c(where: Name = "ExpressionConf")                     [Name, Start_Date__c, End_Date__c]                 )                 -> FIRST()                 -> TRANSFORM(                     IF(                         ISBLANK($source),                          "",                          DAY($source.expression__End_Date__c)                         -                         DAY($source.expression__Start_Date__c)                     )                 )       }, 		{ 			"label": "Venue", 			"value": "Staples Center" 		}, 		{ 			"label": "Location", 			"value": "Los Angeles" 		} 	] }

LET(     {         "$speakers": Query(expression__Speaker__c(where: (expression__Event__r.Name = "ExpressionConf"))                     [                     "Id", "Name", "Event__r.Name",                      "Person__r.Name", "Person__r.Title",                     "Person__r.PhotoUrl__c", "About__c"                     ]                     )                     -> MAP(                         {                             "name": $current.Person__r.Name,                             "title": $current.Person__r.Title,                             "imgUrl": $current.Person__r.expression__PhotoUrl__c,                             "about": $current.expression__About__c                         }                     )     },     {         "title": "Speakers",         "description": "Learn from the experts on the cutting-edge of technology.",         "people": $speakers     })

{ 	"tag": "Pricing", 	"title": "Choose the righ pass for you", 	"description": "Distinctio et nulla eum soluta et neque labore quibusdam. Saepe et quasi iusto modi velit ut non voluptas in. Explicabo id ut laborum.", 	"plans": Query(expression__Product__c(where: expression__Event__r.Name = "ExpressionConf")["Name", "Features__c", "Description__c", "Event__r.Name"])     -> MAP(         {             "name": Name,             "price": GETLISTPRICE(Id),             "action": {                 "label": "Register", 								"type": "action", 								"src": $Action.Apex.CreateSalesOrder(Id), 								"callback": $Action.Lwc.GoToNamedPage( 									{ 										"name": "checkout__c", 										"id": $returnValue 									} 								)             },             "description": expression__Description__c,             "features": SPLIT(expression__Features__c, "\r\n")         }     )     -> SORT("price") }
